original_title: Désirs noirs : Un si violent désir
overview: Paul is the manager of the restaurant of a famous equestrian club. He falls in love with Estelle, former star of racetracks, wife of Joe, club's star jockey. Estelle, tired of her husband, tries to get rid of him and, and pushes Paul to act. He fulfills its mission so that Linda, young mistress of Joe, is accused of the murder for him...
title: Dark Desires: Crime of Love
